short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and share short links easily using free Url Shorten websites and also generate QR code for shortened Url

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Snaptik Url Shortener allows users to quickly and easily shorten long URLs with just a few clicks. This extension is designed to save time and make sharing links more convenient by generating shorter, more manageable URLs that are easier to remember and share. It also provides analytics on the number of clicks on each shortened URL.

1. Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar.
2. The shortened URL will be displayed in the output field.
